ModMetaData.name: SkyMind Neural Manipulation
ModMetaData.author: Killathon
ModMetaData.description:
A sub-mod for SkyMind Network, implementing the neural manipulation implant. With these tools and a SkyMind Core, you will be able to exert ever greater - and more brutal - means of influence over your pawns. From the ability to invoke horrific rampages to outright ripping a consciousness apart and inserting a new random one in, there is a reason the technology for this is outlawed in all law-abiding regions of space.
Another reason that it's great to be out on the Rim, hmm?
Version <color=#FFD800>1.0.0</color>.
